hero.title: The All-in-One Platform for Modern Property Management
hero.subtitle: Automate tasks, track finances, and manage tenants with ease. HNV provides the tools you need to scale your property business efficiently.

features.title: Powerful Tools for Every Role
features.subtitle: From individual landlords to large agencies, our platform is designed to fit your needs.
features.card1Text: View properties, tenants, and payments at a glance. Get a clear overview of your entire portfolio's performance.
features.card2Text: Upload and manage lease agreements, tenant IDs, and other important documents in one secure, accessible location.
features.card3Text: Track every important action with a detailed audit log. Your data is secure with our multi-tenant architecture.
